About

My name is Justin and I've always been fascinated by the development of technology and it's potential to improve people's lives. Recently, I completed an internship at Thales Group, where I used software testing and documentation skills to ensure the quality and reliability of vital automation software. I am also passionate about creating useful applications and learning efficient problem-solving techniques.


Through my studies in computer science, I have gained a greater understanding of core programming concepts and ways to tackle diverse challenges. Some courses I've taken are Data Structures & Algorithms, Machine Learning Theory and Application, Computational Science and Web App Development. My goal is to apply my knowledge and experience to develop impactful solutions that create a positive experience.
